body.description: This AmazonCommercial 2-Ply White Flat Box Facial Tissue Pack contains (30) Flat disposable Facial Tissue Boxes (100, 8'x 8' sheets per box; 3,000 sheets total). A Facial Tissues designed for away-from-home facilities such as, high-traffic commercial buildings, offices, restaurants, break rooms, schools, hotels and healthcare. This bulk pack is ideal for bathrooms, bedrooms, living rooms, classrooms, places of worship, offices and more! We are committed to using Forest Stewardship Council (FSC) certified paper, ensuring that our products come from forests managed pursuant to strict environmental, social, and economic standards.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: AmazonCommercial Facial Tissues Flat Box, 100 Sheets per Box, 30 Boxes

Facial Tissues Perfect for offices, work areas, homes, restrooms, and other everyday spaces. Ultra-Absorbent Backed by reliable strength and durability, the single-use disposable tissues offer a high level of absorbency. Soft 2-Ply Thickness These tissues feel soft and gentle against the skin. Each sheet soothes with lush 2-ply thickness. In the Box Shipment includes 30 flat rectangular boxes with 100 individual sheets (8in x 8in) facial tissue per box.

Browse Our Products Multifold Paper Towels Center Pull Towels Jumbo Roll Toilet Tissues Item Name AmazonCommercial Multifold Paper Towels Item Name AmazonCommercial Center Pull Towels Item Name AmazonCommercial Jumbo Roll Toilet Tissues Category Janitorial Sanitation Category Janitorial Sanitation Category Janitorial Sanitation

What is the difference between the cube-shaped and rectangular-shaped boxes? The only difference is the shape of the box. The dimensions of each sheet (8in x 8in) is the same. Are these facial tissues scented? No, the facial tissues are completely unscented (perfumes have not been added). What color are the facial tissues? The facial tissues are plain white. No inks or dyes have been added. What are the dimensions of each sheet? Each sheet of Facial tissue measures 8inches by 8 inches.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These are at a fair price and should last you almost an entire year if you don't have serious sinus issues. Packaging isn't attractive, but 🤷‍♂️.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It’s good enough to do the job. It does rip a little when pulling it out, but good and soft and does the job.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars These are cheap tissues, but I’m still gonna order them.
reviews.reviewText: These tissues are what you would expect from a very, very inexpensive product. They are not soft, they are not thick, they are not super absorbent. However, they are super cheap. My husband goes through a lot of tissues, and at times even blows his nose on paper towel, so I don’t think he really cares how soft they are. They work, that’s what’s important.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Poor value for money
reviews.reviewText: I purchase large quantities of hotel style tissues like this on a regular basis. The folding of these tissues is a huge issue. Sometimes you pull a two ply tissue as advertised, sometimes it's a three ply tissue which means that the next one will be a one ply tissue and nobody wants that. Often the tissues will not "flag" from the box as expected, forcing you to ding into the box to dig into the box to get the next one out. Based on years of my own purchases experience, I am definitely losing money on these compared to other products like the "Kleenex® Professional Facial Tissue for Business (21400)" simply because the Amazon tissues are often wasted. A three ply tissue is one ply too many and a one ply is useless so it goes in the trash unfulfilled.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Value delivered right to my door!!
reviews.reviewText: 2ply tissues. Not as soft as name brand, but they do a great job! Price is comparable...delivery made it an easy choice.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars THIN. Get something better.
reviews.reviewText: Way too thin to be very useful. Don't get these if you have a cold, you're nose will be redder than it already is and you'll get your snot all over your hands. Even when I double or triple these up, they are awful. And at that point, you're not saving much money on tissues.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great tissue for the money and NO ANNOYING LOTIONS OR SCENTS!
reviews.reviewText: We purchase these for our business and like them because they are just a plain tissue. Good size, no frills, and great value for the money. Tissue boxes are a good size for use on desks or restroom.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars An exercise in cheap manufacturing.
reviews.reviewText: First world problems: You'd think, eh, it's a box of kleenex, what could go wrong? Well, everything that could go wrong with a box of facial tissues will go wrong with these facial tissues, every time.1-Pull up on a tissue and 3 come out.2-Pull up on a tissue and only 1 ply of the next one comes out.3-Pull up on a tissue and none pop out. You have to fish around inside the box to find the next one.4-The box itself comes apart--you can tell they used as little glue as possible to still be able to call it "glued." Amazon might as well bundle these with a roll of tape. If the box happens to fall onto the floor, the tissues will fall out of the box.5-They're quite rough. For me, I consider that a plus--ultra soft tissues tend to feel like they're just spreading your snot around without actually scraping it off like these do. But I know for many people softness is important.These are cheap, but I can't consider these a good value for the price.

reviews.reviewTitle: Great for those allergic to dust
reviews.reviewText: Bought from Amazon September 2019 Need to buy more as almost used upFirm, strong, do not disintegrate.Advertised brands create flying particles that cause sneezingWe REALLY like this productVERY upset to learn not available nowPLEASE reconsider
Very well done, great qualityAlso very good for the house.

Boxes are dirty even when I just take them out from the original package.Boxes not sealed, look like just 'folded' into box shape. You can see the tissues inside. I am quite concerned with the hygiene quality during its production.But the fatal thing is: this facial tissue is unacceptably DUSTY! TISSUE DUSTS fill in the air of my home after I use this for three days. Super irritating for nose and eyes even when I just sit at my desk!If you're concerned about tissue dust, you know Kleenex is bad on this - BUT THIS AMAZON brand is even worst. Probably the WORST! I had to order another brand right away. Now having 2/3 boxes left in the package and I think I have to throw them away. Wasting money and harming my lungs with tissue dust!

These tissues serve their purpose but they are by no means "luxurious." The upside to this is that there isn't a lot of tissue "dust" like the softer varieties have. Sometimes you have to dig to get the tissues out. Price was pretty good, although boxes are small, maybe 2" high. They're okay, just not great.

It’s 2-ply but often splits and it isn’t the softest, it reminds me of the toilet paper from university.BUT the most annoying thing is it doesn’t always pull out the next sheet. I end up having to dig out the next tissue every 3 pulls. I’m on my 3rd box and it’s better. It happens every 5 pulls now.Hoping that there are some that work properly because I’m stuck with 27 more to go.
